Steps to reproduce:
1) install the junit plugin from the JDT UI component page
2) in the workbench make sure that the options
   a) Workbench>Preferences>Debug>"Show Debug Perspective when 
      a program is launched in run mode" is checked. 
   b) Workbench>Preferences>Workbench>"Open a new perspective"/"In a new window"
      is pushed
3) switch the Java perspective
4) run a JUnit tests  Run>JUnit Tests
   ->this will open a test result view and a Debug Workbench window
5) close the Debug workbench window
   ->Widget disposed exception. 
   The code is attempting to update Window menu and attempting
   to access the Debug Workbench Window title. However, this
   window is already closed. 

Once you are in this state you have to exit eclipse.
